<ce:section-title id="st040">Synthesis of complex <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>
</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0045" view="all">A mixture of Mn(OAc)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.0490<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>dpd (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.0512<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), bpy (0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.0312<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), 25% (C<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>NOH (mass fraction) aqueous solution (0.1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>ml) and H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) was sealed in a 23<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated to 160<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>days. After cooling to room temperature at a speed of 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C/h, yellow crystals of complex <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> were obtained, washed with H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and dried in air (Yield: 42% based on Mn). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">18</ce:inf>MnN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>: C, 59.39; H, 3.74, N, 5.77. Found: C, 59.29; H, 3.88; N, 5.72%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3381 (s), 1590 (s), 1545 (s), 1479 (m), 1422(s), 1365 (m), 1243 (s), 1165 (m), 1102 (w), 1057 (w), 1032 (m), 1006 (w), 893 (m), 847 (m), 802 (w), 759 (s), 720 (w), 645 (w), 612 (w), 497(w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st045">Synthesis of complex <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>

The dark red crystals were obtained, washed with H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and dried in air (Yield: 65% based on Co). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">24</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>CoN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>: C, 61.16; H, 3.42; N, 5.94. Found: C, 61.06; H, 3.37; N, 5.85%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3381 (s), 1596 (s), 1551 (s), 1476 (m), 1440 (m), 1395(s), 1372 (s), 1221 (s), 1161 (m), 1092 (m), 1049 (s), 877 (m), 759 (s), 709 (w), 697 (w), 669 (w), 646 (m), 559 (w), 535 (w), 465 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st050">Synthesis of complex <ce:bold>3</ce:bold>

The blue crystals were obtained, washed with H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and dried in air (Yield: 33% based on Cu). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">38</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">25</ce:inf>CuN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>: C, 62.25; H, 3.44; N, 3.82. Found: C, 62.34; H, 3.57; N, 3.75%. The yellow crystals were obtained, washed with H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and dried in air (Yield: 45% based on Mn). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">38</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">26</ce:inf>MnN<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>: C, 66.19; H, 3.80; N, 8.12. Found: C, 66.25; H, 3.62; N, 8.15%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3381 (s), 1619 (s), 1593 (s), 1572 (m), 1562 (m), 1552 (m), 1514 (m), 1478 (w), 1444 (w), 1425 (m), 1370 (s), 1230 (s), 1153 (w), 1092 (w), 1040 (w), 881 (w), 863 (w), 847 (m), 809 (w), 757 (w), 728 (m), 669 (w), 544 (w), 506 (w), 493 (w), 455 (w), 440 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st060">Synthesis of complex <ce:bold>5</ce:bold>

The orange block crystals were obtained, washed with H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and dried in air (Yield: 58% based on Co). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">26</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">18</ce:inf>CoN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>: C, 60.83; H, 3.53; N, 5.46. Found: C, 60.72; H, 3.59; N, 5.56%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3381 (s), 1614 (s), 1589 (s), 1565 (s), 1540 (s), 1515 (m), 1485 (w), 1450 (w), 1423 (m), 1365 (s), 1235 (s), 1146 (m), 1081 (m), 1043 (w), 916 (w), 863 (w), 838 (m), 805 (w), 750 (m), 730 (m), 667 (m), 548 (w), 515 (w), 492 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st065">Synthesis of complex <ce:bold>6</ce:bold>
</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0070" view="all">The synthetic procedure was similar to that of <ce:bold>5</ce:bold> except the temperature was adjusted to 85<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C. The orange crystals were obtained, washed with H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and dried in air (Yield: 63% based on Co). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">26</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">18</ce:inf>CoN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>: C, 60.83; H, 3.53; N, 5.47. Found: C, 60.91; H, 3.64; N, 5.62%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3381 (s), 1608 (s), 1601 (m), 1570 (s), 1558 (m), 1515 (m), 1487 (s), 1455 (m), 1422 (w), 1361 (s), 1240 (m), 1151 (m), 1143 (w), 1097 (s), 1043 (m), 873 (w), 845 (s), 804 (m), 764 (w), 662 (m), 621 (m), 540 (w), 497 (w).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of complex 1 

A mixture of Mn(OAc)2⋅4H2O (0.2mmol, 0.0490g), H2dpd (0.2mmol, 0.0512g), bpy (0.2mmol, 0.0312g), 25% (C2H5)4NOH (mass fraction) aqueous solution (0.1ml) and H2O (5mL) was sealed in a 23mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated to 160°C for 3days. After cooling to room temperature at a speed of 10°C/h, yellow crystals of complex 1 were obtained, washed with H2O and dried in air (Yield: 42% based on Mn). Anal. Calc. for C24H18MnN2O6: C, 59.39; H, 3.74, N, 5.77. Found: C, 59.29; H, 3.88; N, 5.72%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3381 (s), 1590 (s), 1545 (s), 1479 (m), 1422(s), 1365 (m), 1243 (s), 1165 (m), 1102 (w), 1057 (w), 1032 (m), 1006 (w), 893 (m), 847 (m), 802 (w), 759 (s), 720 (w), 645 (w), 612 (w), 497(w).

Synthesis of complex 2 

The synthetic procedure was similar to that of 1, except Co(OAc)2⋅4H2O (0.2mmol, 0.0498g) replaced Mn(OAc)2⋅4H2O. The dark red crystals were obtained, washed with H2O and dried in air (Yield: 65% based on Co). Anal. Calc. for C24H16CoN2O5: C, 61.16; H, 3.42; N, 5.94. Found: C, 61.06; H, 3.37; N, 5.85%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3381 (s), 1596 (s), 1551 (s), 1476 (m), 1440 (m), 1395(s), 1372 (s), 1221 (s), 1161 (m), 1092 (m), 1049 (s), 877 (m), 759 (s), 709 (w), 697 (w), 669 (w), 646 (m), 559 (w), 535 (w), 465 (w).

Synthesis of complex 3 

The synthetic procedure was similar to that of 1, except Cu(OAc)2⋅H2O (0.2mmol, 0.0398g) replaced Mn(OAc)2⋅4H2O. The blue crystals were obtained, washed with H2O and dried in air (Yield: 33% based on Cu). Anal. Calc. for C38H25CuN2O10: C, 62.25; H, 3.44; N, 3.82. Found: C, 62.34; H, 3.57; N, 3.75%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3381 (s), 1598 (s), 1540 (s), 1473 (m), 1443 (s), 1416(s), 1315 (m), 1239 (s), 1159 (m), 1095 (m), 1056 (w), 1024 (w), 1013 (w), 887 (m), 855 (m), 806 (w), 774 (s), 765 (s), 735 (w), 714 (w), 666 (w), 649 (w), 606 (w), 510 (w).

Synthesis of complex 4 

The synthetic procedure was similar to that of 1, except the temperature was adjusted to 110°C and bpy was replaced by phen (0.2mmol, 0.0360g). The yellow crystals were obtained, washed with H2O and dried in air (Yield: 45% based on Mn). Anal. Calc. for C38H26MnN4O6: C, 66.19; H, 3.80; N, 8.12. Found: C, 66.25; H, 3.62; N, 8.15%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3381 (s), 1619 (s), 1593 (s), 1572 (m), 1562 (m), 1552 (m), 1514 (m), 1478 (w), 1444 (w), 1425 (m), 1370 (s), 1230 (s), 1153 (w), 1092 (w), 1040 (w), 881 (w), 863 (w), 847 (m), 809 (w), 757 (w), 728 (m), 669 (w), 544 (w), 506 (w), 493 (w), 455 (w), 440 (w).

Synthesis of complex 5 

The synthetic procedure was similar to that of 4, except Co(OAc)2⋅4H2O (0.2mmol, 0.0498g) replaced Mn(OAc)2⋅4H2O. The orange block crystals were obtained, washed with H2O and dried in air (Yield: 58% based on Co). Anal. Calc. for C26H18CoN2O6: C, 60.83; H, 3.53; N, 5.46. Found: C, 60.72; H, 3.59; N, 5.56%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3381 (s), 1614 (s), 1589 (s), 1565 (s), 1540 (s), 1515 (m), 1485 (w), 1450 (w), 1423 (m), 1365 (s), 1235 (s), 1146 (m), 1081 (m), 1043 (w), 916 (w), 863 (w), 838 (m), 805 (w), 750 (m), 730 (m), 667 (m), 548 (w), 515 (w), 492 (w).

Synthesis of complex 6 

The synthetic procedure was similar to that of 5 except the temperature was adjusted to 85°C. The orange crystals were obtained, washed with H2O and dried in air (Yield: 63% based on Co). Anal. Calc. for C26H18CoN2O6: C, 60.83; H, 3.53; N, 5.47. Found: C, 60.91; H, 3.64; N, 5.62%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3381 (s), 1608 (s), 1601 (m), 1570 (s), 1558 (m), 1515 (m), 1487 (s), 1455 (m), 1422 (w), 1361 (s), 1240 (m), 1151 (m), 1143 (w), 1097 (s), 1043 (m), 873 (w), 845 (s), 804 (m), 764 (w), 662 (m), 621 (m), 540 (w), 497 (w).
